Renter - Class in system.core
Used to compute the rent, return, and ask planning.

report() - Method in class system.core.MyVelib
Print a report of the system (online stations with the list of bicycle parked inside, offline stations with the list of bicycle parked inside and users).

Ride - Class in system.core
This class store the information of a current ride used to compute the cost and to store the bicycle while it's not in a station.
Ride(User, Bicycle, LocalTime) - Constructor for class system.core.Ride
Initialize the ride with the departure values (bicycle taken in the street).
Ride(User, DockingStation, Bicycle, LocalTime) - Constructor for class system.core.Ride
Initialize the ride with the departure values (bicycle taken in a station).
RideItinerary<S,E> - Class in system.core
Stores a starting location, an ending location and the type of bike used.
RideItinerary(S, E, String) - Constructor for class system.core.RideItinerary
Create an object with given start, end and type of bicycle.
RidePlanning - Interface in system.core
RidePlanning to use to provide an itinerary to a user.
